metadata.title: CVE-2023-0047 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: none. Reason: This candidate was in a CNA pool that was not assigned to any issues during 2023. Notes: none.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-0047` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.19.0-46-generic - 5.19.0-26.27
linux-image-5.19.0-46-generic-lpae - 5.19.0-26.27
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-46-generic - 5.19.0-26.27
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-46-generic-64k - 5.19.0-26.27
No subscription required

linux-image-5.19.0-23-generic - 5.19.0-26.27
linux-image-5.19.0-23-generic-64k - 5.19.0-26.27
No subscription required

notes.note: sbeattie> see SUSE bug for reason for rejection.

criterions.comment: linux package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.19.0-26.27').
linux-signed package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.19.0-26.27').
